cart.name: Noir Mystique

products.description: A bold and mysterious scent with dark amber, leather, and sandalwood notes. Ideal for the modern gentleman who commands attention.

products.description: A balanced blend of citrus top notes with warm base notes of amber and musk. Designed to complement any personality and occasion.

products.name: Vanilla Dream
products.description: Sweet and comforting fragrance with Madagascar vanilla, tonka bean, and soft floral undertones. Like a warm embrace in a bottle.

products.name: Ocean Breeze
products.description: Fresh aquatic scent with sea salt, bergamot, and marine notes. Evokes the crisp, clean air of coastal mornings.

products.name: Citrus Fusion
products.description: Energetic blend of grapefruit, lemon, and orange with a hint of green tea. Perfect for daily wear and uplifting your mood.

products.name: Midnight Bloom
products.description: An intoxicating evening fragrance with jasmine, gardenia, and dark patchouli. For the woman who embraces her sensual side.

products.name: Leather & Oak
products.description: Robust and sophisticated scent combining aged leather, oakwood, and subtle tobacco notes. Timeless elegance for the discerning man.
